text:
Bishan North Bird Pergola, opened by Encik Ibrahim Bin Othman on Aug 16, 1998, where The Bishan Shama Club Singapore (Bishan North CC Birds' Club) is situated, aims to promote a healthy and all encompassing social environment for enthusiasts of the White Rumped Shama to gather. The Club seek to forge friendships amongst enthusiasts and interested individuals of this magnificent song bird.

Weekly White Rumped Shama gatherings at 284 Bishan Street 22 every Wednesday and Saturday evening from 7:00pm to 10:15pm

Nearest Bus Stop - B53381
Service Numbers: 13, 52, 54, 88, 162, 162M, 410 and NRI

Nearest MRT Station - Bishan MRT (NS17/CC15)
14 minutes via foot from Exit B
